name: Bullets X Blades
description:
This game was made for August 2017 Philly Dev Night game jam: Band Jam. 

2 player action where one player wins by taking down the opponent's life bar to 0 or having more life meter than the opponent. 

(NOTE: this game is meant for competitive 2 player action. 2 players are REQUIRED. Keyboard can be used but game controller is optimal.)

Recommended screen resolution: any resolution that has 16:9 aspect ratio.

Key command for Player 1 (GUNZ):

up/down/left/right buttons - directional 

, - Melee Attack

. - Special Attack

? - Block

Key command for Player 2 (ROSEZ):

SHIFT - Dash

WADS - directional 

` - Melee Attack

1 - Special Attack

2 - Block

3 - Dash
